name: Great Demon Lord Adventure
description:
Let's Plays and Official Trailer on our YouTube Playlist:


Story

When Prince Panbub loses his powers, he must rely on his better half (or halves) to save two worlds.


Features
  • Mini-RPG:  About 3 hours of gameplay
  • Some Cute, Homemade Battle Animations
  • Develop Your Characters' Skills in Any Order
  • Quirky Demon Humor
  • Optional New Game Plus

Screenshots

Grap-ity Purple!  These drawings moved from the fridge to your screen!

Explore Panbub's Beloved World!

Many enemies and moves for a variety of combat experiences!
